sources.title: Bedside Manner (1945) aka Her Favorite Patient | Romantic Comedy | Full Length Movie
sources.description:
Macho pilot is treated by a woman doctor. Complications ensue.

Also Known As: Her Favorite Patient
Director: Andrew L. Stone 
Writers: Malcolm Stuart Boylan, Robert Carson 
Stars: John Carroll, Ruth Hussey, Charles Ruggles
Genres: Classics, Comedy, Romantic Comedy, War

CCC CHAPTERS: 
00:00 Full Length Movie
07:48 Meet the Smiths
08:46 Xray protocol of 1945
09:52 Dr. Hedy Fredericks, MD
23:09 Catnip to women
23:36 Enter the Russian pilot comrade Punchinskaya
38:53 Leaving Blythfield car chase

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: A beautiful female doctor visits her small hometown on her way back to Chicago. Her overworked uncle, who is the town's doctor, wants her to stay and help him, and he and a macho test pilot who's fallen for her come up with a plan that involves the pilot faking an illness and being treated by her, with her uncle's "help".
metadata.Writer: Malcolm Stuart Boylan, Robert Carson, Frederick J. Jackson
metadata.Actors: John Carroll, Ruth Hussey, Charles Ruggles
